title: Airline industry shifts attention to Russia risks after Ukraine closure
description: Alaska's Anchorage Airport said airlines have started making inquiries about capacity in case routes over Russia are impacted due to the Ukraine crisis, in a sign of the conflict's growing fallout for the global aviation industry.
content: Feb 25 (Reuters) - Alaska's Anchorage Airport said airlines have started making inquiries about capacity in case routes over Russia are impacted due to the Ukraine crisis, in a sign of the conflict'sâ€¦ [+4004 chars]
